name: Blade Bros ACTION!
description:
Description


"Welcome to the BladeBros Action!, that's game introduces you a new game genre, who we named "Hack n' Plataformer", a genre where combines hack n' slash with plataformer game genre.

Key Features

Slash you opponents, combine your skills, and battle with powerful bosses.
Each level is a challenge to be overcome, use your skills and conquer each level of this game.


Use element swords, make combos, and join forces with your brother against the all monsters!.
Frenetic fights and a bombastic soundtrack wait for you!. Enjoy!."
